title: Console Output
objective: Use console.log to observe program behavior.

title: Variables (let/const)
objective: Store values in variables and print them.

title: Reassignment
objective: Update variables and understand state changes.

title: Template Literals
objective: Use backticks and ${} for readable strings.

title: Data Types (typeof)
objective: Inspect types and reason about values.

title: Comparisons
objective: Compare values with >, <, === and interpret results.

title: NaN & Validation
objective: Detect invalid numbers and handle gracefully.

title: Formatting
objective: Format numbers with toFixed and locale strings.

title: Mini Challenge: Tip Calculator
objective: Combine conversion + math into a useful tool.

title: Switch Statement
objective: Select behavior by value using switch.

title: Guard Clauses
objective: Return early to simplify complex logic.

title: Edge Cases
objective: Design with unusual user input in mind.

title: Mini Challenge: Grade Evaluator
objective: Turn numeric inputs into letter grades.

title: Create & Index Arrays
objective: Store ordered data and access by index.

title: filter()
objective: Keep only items that match a rule.

title: reduce()
objective: Summarize arrays into a single value.

title: Sorting
objective: Sort numbers and strings with custom compare.

title: Nested Objects
objective: Model more complex data with nesting.

title: Mini Challenge: Profile Card Data
objective: Model user data for later DOM rendering.

title: Arrow Functions
objective: Use arrow syntax and understand differences.

title: Pure vs Impure
objective: Recognize side effects and write clean logic.

title: Mini Challenge: Utility Toolkit
objective: Build a small set of reusable helpers.

title: Hoisting Basics
objective: Understand what hoists and what doesn’t.

title: Closure Counter
objective: Build a counter with private state.

title: IIFE Pattern
objective: Encapsulate logic with immediately invoked functions.

title: Module Pattern
objective: Expose a public API, keep internals private.

title: Pattern: Accumulator
objective: Build results gradually during a loop.

title: Pattern: Sentinel
objective: Stop looping when a value is found.

title: Big-O Intuition
objective: Spot slower code and improve it.

title: Assertions
objective: Write simple checks to verify assumptions.

title: Mini Challenge: Self-Test
objective: Add a tiny test runner for functions.

title: Config Objects
objective: Use config to avoid magic numbers.

title: State Objects
objective: Store app state in a single place.

title: Separation: logic vs UI
objective: Split DOM code from pure logic.

title: Refactoring Exercise
objective: Improve earlier code without changing behavior.

title: Attributes
objective: Get/set attributes like src, href, data-*.

title: Mini Challenge: Card Renderer
objective: Render data objects as DOM cards.

title: Event Delegation
objective: Handle many items with one listener.

title: Empty States
objective: Show helpful messages when no data.

title: Pagination
objective: Render partial lists and navigate pages.

title: Search Filter
objective: Filter displayed items as user types.

title: Mini Challenge: Product Grid
objective: Render cards with filters and pagination.

title: Form Serialization
objective: Collect form values into an object.

title: State Store
objective: Centralize state and re-render on change.

title: Mini Challenge: Component Library Starter
objective: Build a small vanilla component toolkit.

title: CSS Variables
objective: Control themes via CSS custom properties.

title: Class-based Animations
objective: Trigger CSS animations via class changes.

title: Scroll Spy
objective: Update UI based on scroll position.

title: Debounce
objective: Limit how often a function runs.

title: Throttle
objective: Run at most once per time window.

title: Promise.all
objective: Run tasks in parallel and combine results.

title: POST JSON
objective: Send JSON data to an endpoint (mock).

title: App Settings
objective: Persist settings like theme and layout.

title: Kanban Lite v1
objective: Columns and cards with drag support.

title: Chat UI Mock
objective: Render messages and send flow (no backend).

title: Mini Challenge: Portfolio Landing
objective: A landing page that links your best demos.

title: Performance Basics
objective: Minimize reflows and heavy DOM work.

title: Responsive UI
objective: Adapt layout based on viewport width.

title: Mini Challenge: Audit & Refactor
objective: Refactor a prior app for speed and clarity.

title: Prompting for Refactors
objective: Refactor for readability without behavior change.

title: Prompting for Tests
objective: Generate test cases and edge cases.

title: AI + Code Reviews
objective: Simulate a senior dev review and apply feedback.

title: AI for Learning Plans
objective: Create a study plan for your weak areas.

title: Mini Challenge: Improve a Project
objective: Use AI to propose and implement upgrades.

title: Mini Challenge: Portfolio Narrative
objective: Use AI to write project README/story.
